name: Molossia
declaringWar: We won't risk our independence like we did with Kickassia, this time we'll attack first.
attacked: It was enough with the Germans, but I think I'll have to get rid of you
defeated: LONG LIVE MOLOSSIA, YOU JUST CAN'T DEFEAT US AAAAAAHHHHHHH
introduction: Hello, i am the unmatched and magnificent President Kevin Baugh of the independent and sovereign Republic of Molossia
neutralHello: How many cookies do you have for me?
hateHello: i don't want you on the MicroCon anymore
tradeRequest: You will officially recognize me if you accept this offer.
